title: Banchero, Magic agree to $239M rookie max deal
description: Magic star Paolo Banchero has agreed to a five-year, $239 million maximum rookie contract extension that could reach $287 million, his agent told ESPN.
author: Shams Charania

title: Elder Chavez defends son arrested by ICE agents
description: Former world champ Julio Cesar Chavez is set to defend his same-name son, who was arrested by U.S. immigration agents at his Los Angeles home for overstaying his visa and lying on a green card application.

title: 'I don't take this as a win' - Sinner on cruel Dimitrov blow
description: Jannik Sinner says he cannot accept his progress to the Wimbledon quarter-finals "as a win" following Grigor Dimitrov's injury heartbreak.

title: 'Legend Lara should keep Test record' - why Mulder stopped on 367
description: South Africa’s Wiaan Mulder declares on 367 not out, passing up the opportunity to break Brian Lara’s record for the highest individual score in a Test innings.

title: Dimitrov forced to retire when two sets up on world No 1 Sinner
description: Grigor Dimitrov was left in tears as he was forced to retire injured while leading Jannik Sinner by two sets to miss out on the Wimbledon quarter-finals.

title: Newcastle agree fee to sign Forest's Elanga
description: Newcastle have agreed a fee of £55m to sign Anthony Elanga from Nottingham Forest.

title: Keider Montero keeps Tigers pitching dominance going in 4-1 win over Rays
description: Keider Montero and three relievers combined on a five-hitter and the Detroit Tigers beat the Tampa Bay Rays 4-1 on Monday night. The Tigers (58-34) have won four straight games while only allowing four runs, improving to 24 games over .500 for the first time since 2013. Montero (4-1) allowed one run and four hits and a walk in six innings while striking out four.
author: DAVE HOGG

title: Player grades: Short-handed Sixers fall to Thunder in summer league
description: The short-handed version of the Philadelphia 76ers fall to the Oklahoma City Thunder in the summer league on Monday.
